A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As much as this has divided fans\, it came out mostly on top for me. Some really big emotional highs that TFA didn't touch but also some low points that TFA didn't have either. Seeing Yoda back was the best but some of the humor was just misplaced or didn't tonely belong. And Johnson did throw away a lot of the big questions TFA set up\, which was disappointing. I was ok with the handling of Luke and where Rey is heading tho.
